original_text: Then they took up their regular positions as prescribed in the Law of Moses the man of God. The priests splashed against the altar the blood handed to them by the Levites.
korean_text: 규례대로 각각 자기들의 처소에 서고 하나님의 사람 모세의 율법을 따라 제사장들이 레위 사람의 손에서 피를 받아 뿌리니라

sentences.original_text: Then they took up their regular positions
as prescribed in the Law of Moses the man of God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 사람 모세의 율법에 규정된 대로

sentences.original_text: The priests splashed against the altar the blood
handed to them by the Levites
